alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 01 at 3:07AM AKST until January 04 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph creating possible whiteout conditions. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility in whiteout conditions. Expect areas of significant drifting snowfall. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.
